page.title: 15A BITE TO EAT COVENTRY S.W.
page.content: {Sheila's Kitchen}in Cheylesmore is her only business concern.The restaurant has been open for three years.Sheila works 7 days a week,sometimes starting the day at 0715 and not finishing until 0200.There are 33 staff,4 of them work full time.On the daily menu is a roast dish and a rice dish.A three course meal costs Â£4.75.All the food is freshly made on the day and is all'Home Cooking'.There are always 4 vegetables on the menu which is varied daily.There is also a separate evening menu and snacks are made on request.Sheila chose the name'Kitchen' because it was original at the time and the cooking area can be seen whilst eating:this is seen as an incentive for hygiene.The building contains 2 dining areas one on the first floor and the other at street level.
